text:
Missing the point completely. No innovation here, just mutations and hundreds of iPhone references. I agree one size fits all is a terrible approach.

How I see it? Personal Assistant, who knows contents of your fridge, suprises you with new Cd for your birthday — which you WILL love. Looks after your digital life effortlessly, only pointing ‘the life changing' situations, why should you bother about anything else?

Interface? Just earbud and mic, oh and eye— pretty awesome camera hey?

Think Jarvis, TARS. We do have advanced deep learning technology. We do have technology for vision, hearing, voice implants.
title: Missing the point completely. – luka_synthetic –
